DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate clinical radiological outcome iRoot SP root canal sealer comparison AH Plus sealer within 1-year follow up.Patients need root canal treatment enrol allot either iRoot SP group AH Plus arm randomly . After root canal shaping cleaning , teeth obturate accord arm . Assessment postoperative pain do 1 week root canal obturation use visual analog scale . After 1-year follow-up , clinical radiographic evaluation carry . Statistical analysis P < 0.05 conducted measure difference arm .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation iRoot SP Root Canal Sealer : A Clinical Study
DOC.criteria: Subjects require : 1. mature tooth close apex ; 2. one single multirooted tooth irreversible pulpitis , pulp necrosis apical periodontitis ; 3. prepare appear followup 4. sign inform consent form . Subjects : 1. moderate severe marginal periodontitis ; 2. internal external root resorption periapical radiograph ; 3. active systemic disease ; 4. physical mental disability , 5. pregnant lactating
